Walnut_Creek.Buchanan Field Airport:
Buchanan Field Airport (IATA: CCR, ICAO: KCCR, FAA LID: CCR) is a county-owned public-use airport in Contra Costa County, California, United States, located one mile (1.6 km) west of the center of Concord and east of the unincorporated community of Pacheco. The airport's street address is 550 Sally Ride Drive, Concord.
The National Plan of Integrated Airport Systems for 2011–2015 categorized it as a reliever airport.
